common.description: AI-powered sports analysis platform. Get analysis for Football, NBA, MLB matches, teams, and players.

home.title: PlayStat - AI Sports Analysis Platform

home.hero_description: We simplify complex stats and highlight only the key insights you need.

landing.title: PlayStat
landing.subtitle: AI sports intelligence platform
landing.description: PlayStat transforms match data into neon-clear signals.
landing.note: Each sport has its own experience and analysis.
landing.about_point1_desc: Keep only meaningful signals to speed up decisions.
landing.about_point2_desc: Combine tactics, flow, and variables into one view.
landing.about_point3_desc: Analyze every match with the same standards.
landing.hero_side_note: AI helps you read the flow of the game.
landing.features_lead: PlayStat rebuilds complexity into a multi-stage pipeline. Signal extraction → context modeling → risk simulation → synthesis in one flow.
landing.feature_speed_desc: Key takeaways at a glance for matches and teams.
landing.feature_depth_desc: Tactics, flow, and variables summarized with clarity.
landing.feature_trust_desc: Built on official sources and updated consistently.
landing.feature_signal_desc: Remove noise and keep only meaningful signals.
landing.feature_context_desc: Form, matchups, and schedule context in one place.
landing.service_stat1_desc: Starting with football and expanding per sport.
landing.service_stat2_desc: Fresh reports and insights every day
landing.service_stat3_desc: Flow, risk, and tactics in a single view
landing.image_placeholder_desc: We will place a primary product visual or screenshot here.
landing.insight_step1_desc: Ingest league, team, match, and schedule signals in layers.
landing.insight_step2_desc: Normalize and index signals into comparable metrics.
landing.insight_step3_desc: Model tactical context and simulate risk dynamics.
landing.insight_step4_desc: Compress into conclusions, key points, and a one-line summary.
landing.project_one_desc: Today’s matches and AI insights in one view.
landing.project_two_desc: Summaries of form, stats, and momentum.
landing.contact_subtitle: Send partnership, ads, or data inquiries
landing.contact_note: Complete the send action in your mail client.
landing.sports_subtitle: Jump into the sport you want
landing.sport_football_desc: Today's matches, daily reports, and AI match analysis.
landing.sport_racing_desc: Racing analysis experience is coming soon.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1_title: 1. Purpose of Collection and Use of Personal Information
privacy.section1_content: PlayStat (hereinafter 'the Service') collects minimal personal information for service provision and improvement. The collected information is used solely for service operation, user experience enhancement, and statistical analysis.
privacy.section2_content: The Service may automatically collect the following information:
privacy.data_type2: Access logs (IP address, access time, pages visited)
privacy.data_type3: Information collected through cookies and similar technologies
privacy.section3_content: The collected personal information is used for the following purposes:
privacy.purpose2: Service usage statistics analysis and improvement
privacy.section4_content: The collected personal information is retained during the service usage period and will be destroyed without delay upon service withdrawal or consent withdrawal. However, if retention is required by relevant laws, it will be stored for the required period.
privacy.section5_title: 5. Sharing Personal Information with Third Parties
privacy.section5_content: The Service does not provide personal information to third parties without user consent. However, anonymized data may be shared with advertising partners such as Google AdSense when required by law.
privacy.section6_content: The Service provides advertisements through Google AdSense and may use cookies for this purpose. Users can refuse cookies through browser settings, but this may limit service usage.
privacy.contact_content: For inquiries regarding personal information, please contact us at contact@playstat.space.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1_content: These terms and conditions are intended to establish the terms and procedures for using the sports data analysis services provided by PlayStat (hereinafter 'the Service').
terms.section2_content: The Service is a sports data insight platform that provides football match data, team statistics, and AI-based analysis information. The Service provides pure data analysis information only and has no connection to any form of betting or gambling activities.
terms.section3_content: Users shall not engage in the following activities when using the Service:
terms.prohibited1: Using the service for illegal purposes
terms.prohibited2: Interfering with the normal operation of the service
terms.prohibited3: Infringing or misusing other people's personal information
terms.prohibited4: Copying or distributing service content without authorization
terms.section4_content: The Service is provided 24 hours a day, 365 days a year in principle. However, the service may be temporarily suspended due to system maintenance or failures, and service content may be changed after prior notice.
terms.section5_content: All information provided by the Service is for reference only, and we do not guarantee the accuracy or completeness of the information. The responsibility for decisions made based on the Service's analysis information lies entirely with the user. The Service does not provide any form of outcome predictions or betting advice.
terms.section6_content: Copyright of the content provided by the Service belongs to the Service. Users may use information obtained through the Service for personal, non-commercial purposes only and may not copy, distribute, or modify it without prior approval.
terms.section7_content: The Service may change the terms if necessary, and the changed terms will take effect through notification within the Service.
terms.contact_content: For inquiries regarding service usage, please contact us at contact@playstat.space.

about.title: About PlayStat
about.description: Football match data at a glance
about.mission_content: Tired of searching for team info before every match? PlayStat gives you recent form, head-to-head records, and season stats all in one place. No more digging through multiple sites - just the info you need to enjoy the game.
about.feature1_description: Quick summaries of both teams' recent form and key stats before each match.
about.feature2_description: Keep track of Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, and other top leagues.
about.feature3_description: Check any team's season record, goals, and standings instantly.
about.feature4_description: Every day, we highlight the most interesting matches to watch.
about.offer3: Last 5 matches, H2H records, home/away stats
about.disclaimer_content: PlayStat organizes match data for football fans. We don't predict results or encourage betting. Everything here is just to help you enjoy watching football more.
